children.text:
This dictionary contains contents from various internet sites, google translation and manual data entry. 
 a) Nepali-English Dictionary
 compiled by Karl-Heinz Kr√§mer
 South Asia Institute, University of Heidelberg
 URL: http://www.nepalresearch.org/dictionaries/nep_eng/nep_eng.pdf

 b) Google Transltaion
 URL: http://translate.google.com/#en/hi/

 c) High frequency words used in Nepali News websites including NepalNews.com, ekantipur.com etc
 Please help us to include more words at
 https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Ako2Ig-WN50ZdElxX0l4Y2lzd3ltdUJfcFBsbmNmMHc
